  • Method Details

    • getAllEventsOrderedByDateInStab

      @GetMapping("/stablishment/{stablishmentID}/event/all-ordered") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllEventsOrderedByDateInStab(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stabID)
      This method is used to get all events from a stablishment ordered by date starting by today.
      Parameters:
      stabID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      Returns:
      a list of all events from the stablishment ordered by date ascendant starting by today.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment does not exist or if the stablishment does not have any events.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

    • getAllEvents

      @GetMapping("/event/all") public List<eventDto> getAllEvents()
      This method is used to get all events starting by today ordered by date.
      Returns:
      a list of all events ordered by date.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if there are no events.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

    • getEventInStabByEventNameAndDate

      @GetMapping("/stablishment/{stablishmentID}/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getEventInStabByEventNameAndDate(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable String eventName, @PathVariable LocalDate eventDate)
      This method is used to get an event from a stablishment by its name and date.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event to be retrieved.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      an event.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment or event does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.

    • addEventToStab

      @PostMapping("/stablishment/{stablishmentID}/event/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addEventToStab(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stabID, @RequestBody event newEvent, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to add an event to a stablishment.
      Parameters:
      stabID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      newEvent - This is the event to be added.
      token - This is the JWT token of the manager.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates the event has been added successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
      Input Format:
      { "eventName": "String", "eventDate": "LocalDate", "eventDescription": "String", "eventPrice": "float", "totalTickets": "int", "eventFinishDate": "LocalDate", "eventTime": "String" }

    • addPersistentEventToStab

      @PostMapping("/stablishment/{stablishmentID}/event/persistent/{repeticiones}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addPersistentEventToStab(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stabID, @PathVariable("repeticiones") int repeticiones, @RequestBody event newEvent, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to add a persistent event to a stablishment.
      Parameters:
      stabID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      repeticiones - This is the number of times the event will be repeated.
      newEvent - This is the event to be added.
      token - This is the JWT token of the manager.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates the event has been added successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
      Input Format:
      { "eventName": "String", "eventDate": "LocalDate", "eventDescription": "String", "eventPrice": "float", "totalTickets": "int", "eventFinishDate": "LocalDate", "eventTime": "String" }

    • attendanceControlWorkers

      @PostMapping("/stablishment/{stablishmentID}/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}/attendance-control") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> attendanceControlWorkers(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stabID, @PathVariable("eventName") String eventName, @PathVariable("eventDate") LocalDate eventDate, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token) throws org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttException, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      This method is used to check the attendance of the event.
      Parameters:
      stabID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event.
      token - This is the JWT token of the manager.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates that the attendance control has been done successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment does not exist or if the stablishment does not have any events.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
      org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.MqttException
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

    • updateEventFromStablishment

      @PutMapping("/stablishment/{stablishmentID}/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}/update") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateEventFromStablishment(@PathVariable("stablishmentID") Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable String eventName, @PathVariable LocalDate eventDate, @RequestBody event targetEvent, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to update an event from a stablishment.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event to be updated.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event to be updated.
      targetEvent - This is the event to be updated.
      token - This is the JWT token of the manager.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates the event has been updated successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment or event does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
      Input Format:
      { "eventName": "String", "eventDate": "LocalDate", "eventDescription": "String", "eventPrice": "float", "totalTickets": "int", "eventFinishDate": "LocalDate", "eventTime": "String" }

    • deleteEventFromStablishment

      @DeleteMapping("/stablishment/{stablishmentID}/event/{eventName}/{eventDate}/delete") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteEventFromStablishment(@PathVariable Long stablishmentID, @PathVariable String eventName, @PathVariable LocalDate eventDate, @RequestHeader("Authorization") String token)
      This method is used to delete an event from a stablishment.
      Parameters:
      stablishmentID - This is the ID of the stablishment.
      eventName - This is the name of the event to be deleted.
      eventDate - This is the date of the event to be deleted.
      token - This is the JWT token of the manager.
      Returns:
      a message that indicates the event has been deleted successfully.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the stablishment or event does not exist.
      Exception - if there is an error in the server.
